Package tellosimulator.common

Class VectorHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • tellosimulator.common.VectorHelper
  • public class VectorHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A static helper class for frequently used vector calculations.

      static javafx.geometry.Point3D getDownwardsNormalVector()
      Convenience method to access the vector pointing straight downwards (equals y-axis in the JavaFX coordinate system).
      static javafx.geometry.Point3D getLeftNormalVector​(javafx.geometry.Point3D vector)
      Computes the cross product of the vector pointing upwards (0, -1, 0) and the specific input vector.
      static java.lang.Double getRadiusOfCircle​(javafx.geometry.Point3D p1, javafx.geometry.Point3D p2, javafx.geometry.Point3D p3)
      Computes the radius of a circle given three points in 3D space.

      Convenience method to access the vector pointing straight upwards.

      Rotates a vector around the y-axis by a certain angle.
      static javafx.geometry.Point3D rotateVector​(javafx.geometry.Point3D v, javafx.geometry.Point3D axis, double angle)

    • Method Detail

      • getLeftNormalVector

        public static javafx.geometry.Point3D getLeftNormalVector​(javafx.geometry.Point3D vector)
        Computes the cross product of the vector pointing upwards (0, -1, 0) and the specific input vector.
        Parameters:
        vector -
        Returns:
        the vector pointing left of the input vector, parallel to the flying plane

      • getRightNormalVector

        public static javafx.geometry.Point3D getRightNormalVector​(javafx.geometry.Point3D vector)
        Computes the cross product of the the specific input vector and vector pointing upwards (0, -1, 0) .
        Parameters:
        vector -
        Returns:
        the vector pointing right of the input vector, parallel to the flying plane

      • getUpwardsNormalVector

        public static javafx.geometry.Point3D getUpwardsNormalVector()
        Convenience method to access the vector pointing straight upwards. (equals the negative y-axis in the JavaFX coordinate system).
        Returns:
        the normalized vector pointing upwards

      • getDownwardsNormalVector

        public static javafx.geometry.Point3D getDownwardsNormalVector()
        Convenience method to access the vector pointing straight downwards (equals y-axis in the JavaFX coordinate system).
        Returns:
        the normalized vector pointing upwards

      • getCenterOfCircle

                                                        javafx.geometry.Point3D p2,
                                                        javafx.geometry.Point3D p3)
        Computes the center point of a circle given three points in 3D space.
        Parameters:
        p1 -
        p2 -
        p3 -
        Returns:
        the center point of the circle, or null if the given points are collinear.

        Source

        Rotates a vector around a given axis by a certain angle. Rotation is clockwise to the axis (viewed from above).
